afterSelectingRegion: After selecting a region, click on the marker to remove it or click on another region to change the selection.
citiesWillBeMarked: Cities closer to your mouse (or the selected region) will be marked if the sum of their population is below the total COVID-19 deaths in Brazil.
forReferencesAboutInformation: For more references about information, take a look at the footer of the page
goalIsBringAwareness: The goal of this project is to bring awareness to the number of deaths caused by COVID-19.
mouseForResults: Place the mouse over the map to see the results. Click to select a region.
thisMeansGhostTown: This means that COVID-19 deaths in Brazil could have reduced the population of those cities to zero, making them completely ghost towns.
